body_html: @vrv BTW: By implementing a very hacky version of this patch, I have confirmed that with this fix will allow you to use Tensorflow with CUDA IPC. (My hacky version just edited cuda_platform.cc to always select just one GPU based on an environment variable, and to return 1 for VisibleDeviceCount()). So definitely looking forward to this patch landing in Tensorflow master – do you know a rough ETA for this? Thank you!!
